class api.utils.checkers_collection.DataCheck(peft_task=None, model=None, learning_params=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for checking and preprocessing input data for Fedot AutoML.

Parameters:

  • input_data – Input data in tuple format (X, y) or Fedot InputData object.

  • task – Machine learning task, either “classification” or “regression”.

logger¶

Logger instance for logging messages.

Type:

logging.Logger

input_data¶

Preprocessed and initialized Fedot InputData object.

Type:

InputData

task¶

Machine learning task for the dataset.

Type:

str

check_input_data(input_data: [<class 'fedot.core.data.data.InputData'>, <class 'fedcore.data.data.CompressionInputData'>] = None) → InputData[source]¶

Checks and preprocesses the input data for Fedot AutoML.

Performs the following steps:

  1. Initializes the input_data attribute based on its type.

  2. Checks and preprocesses the features (replacing NaNs, converting to torch format).

  3. Checks and preprocesses the target variable (encoding labels, casting to float).

Returns:

The preprocessed and initialized Fedot InputData object.

Return type:

InputData

api.utils.data.check_multivariate_data(data: DataFrame) → tuple[source]¶

Checks if the provided pandas DataFrame contains multivariate data.

Parameters:

data (pd.DataFrame) – The DataFrame to be analyzed.

Returns:

True if the DataFrame contains multivariate data (nested columns), False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

api.utils.data.get_compression_input(model, train_dataloader, val_dataloader, task='classification', num_classes=None, train_loss=None)[source]¶
api.utils.data.init_input_data(X: DataFrame, y: ndarray | None, task: str = 'classification') → InputData[source]¶

Initializes a Fedot InputData object from input features and target.

Parameters:

  • X – The DataFrame containing features.

  • y – The NumPy array containing target values.

  • task – The machine learning task type (“classification” or “regression”). Defaults to “classification”.

Returns:

The initialized Fedot InputData object.

Return type:

InputData
